summary: IT FEELS LIKE THE POWER STEERING INTERMITTENTLY GOES OUT WHILE DRIVING, MAKING THE CAR VERY DIFFICULT TO STEER.  IT IS MOST NOTICEABLE AT LOWER SPEEDS, WHILE DRIVING IN PARKING LOTS OR CITY STREETS, BUT THERE IS MORE RESISTANCE THAN USUAL AT HIGHWAY SPEEDS.  THE STEERING WHEEL ALSO DO NOT RETURN TO CENTER AFTER A TURN.  IT'S LIKE THE POWER STEERING WORKS WHEN IT WANTS TO.
